## WCH\_PROVIDER\_CONTENT\_COMPONENT variable

Provides the rendering context component

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
WCH_PROVIDER_CONTENT_COMPONENT: import("@acoustic-content-sdk/react-api").ReactProvider<import("@acoustic-content-sdk/react-api").ReactComponent<ContentComponentProps, any>>
```
